titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 292: Kitāb Nasīm al-ṣabā ...

To the extent possible under law, Columbia University, Rare Book & Manuscript Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 292: Kitāb Nasīm al-ṣabā .... This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

msContents.summary: Copy of Nasīm al-ṣabā, a collection of poetry segments and couplets on a variety of topics, followed by a section of blurbs about the writings of six well-known authors, and finishing with a collection of poetry with short introductions.

persName.#text: Ibn Ḥabīb al-Ḥalabī, Badr al-Dīn al-Ḥasan ibn ʻUmar, 1310-1377
ابن حبيب الحلبي، بدر الدين الحسن بن عمر،

supportDesc.extent: 69 leaves : 197 x 145 (155 x 90) mm, bound to 197 x 150 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed. Catchwords each verso, lower left.

binding.p: Paperboard cover with plain paper sides and red leather spine.

origin.p: Probably copied in the first half of the 18th century. A statement at the end of the work gives a date of 1763.

provenance: Formerly owned by George Arthur Plimpton (bookplate inside front cover).
